content.question: Which gas, if any, has molecules with the greatest average kinetic energy?

choices.label: The molecules in all three samples have the same average kinetic energy.

content.answer: The molecules in all three samples have the same average kinetic energy.

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
